sentences.en: As the egg whites cook, they coagulate and rise to the surface.
sentences.cn: 蛋白一煮就会凝结，并且浮起来。

sentences.en: Convictions will rise steeply now photographic evidence is admissible.
sentences.cn: 既然照片证据可以接受，有罪判决将大幅增加。

sentences.en: Crudeness is on the rise in all fields of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 所有娱乐领域都日益粗俗化。

sentences.en: He expects the unemployment figures to rise even higher in coming months.
sentences.cn: 他预计失业人数会在今后几个月里进一步攀升。

sentences.en: He will get a pay rise of nearly £4,000.
sentences.cn: 他的工资将会上涨将近4,000英镑。

sentences.en: Ink particles attach themselves to air bubbles and rise to the surface.
sentences.cn: 墨汁颗粒附着在气泡上，浮到表面上。

sentences.en: Over a given period, the value of shares will rise and fall.
sentences.cn: 股票的价值在某一特定的时期内会有涨跌。

sentences.en: She watched the steady rise and fall of his chest.
sentences.cn: 她看着他的胸膛均匀地一起一伏。

sentences.en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
sentences.cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

sentences.en: The decline in marriage has been offset by a rise in cohabitation.
sentences.cn: 结婚人数的减少由于同居人数的增加而得以弥补。

sentences.en: The high and low-rise apartment blocks built in the 1960s are crumbling.
sentences.cn: 20世纪60年代建造的高低不一的公寓楼群正在逐渐破损坍塌。

sentences.en: The hills rise green and sheer above the broad river.
sentences.cn: 这些小山碧绿陡峭，矗立在这条宽阔的河流之上。

sentences.en: The paper'sprice rise will encourage readers to desert in even greater numbers.
sentences.cn: 报纸价格的上涨将导致更多的读者不再订阅。

sentences.en: The police seem unable to cope with the rising tide of (= large increase in ) car crime.
sentences.cn: 面对日益增多的汽车罪案，警方似乎无能为力。

sentences.en: The seasonally adjusted unemployment figures show a rise of twelve-hundred.
sentences.cn: 受季节影响，失业人数增加了1,200人。

sentences.en: The sun rises in the east.
There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: We have allowed spending and borrowing to rise in this recession.
sentences.cn: 在此经济萧条时期，我们容许增加消费和借贷。

words.tran_cn: 起床者；起义者；竖板；叛徒
升高；站起来；反抗（rise的过去分词）
上升（rise的过去式）；增加；起立

phrases.phrase: get (或 take) a rise out of

phrases.tran_cn: 在增加；在增长；在上升；在上涨
上升时间；上沿时间；升压时间；升起时间；增长时间；生成时间
某人越来越成功（或受欢迎）

trans.tran_cn: 上升，增加，加薪，兴起，上坡，小山
trans.tran_en: an increase in number, amount, or value
to increase in number, amount, or value

trans.tran_cn: 上升，提高，增长，起床，站起来，反抗，耸立，凸起，脸红，起源，发酵，散会，复活
trans.tran_en: to increase in number, amount, or value

trans.tran_cn: 上升，上涨；升起；站起，起床；增强，增加；反抗
trans.tran_en: to increase in number, amount, or value
